definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
Robin Li (1968-), founder and CEO of Baidu 百度, a PRC Internet company
Dehong prefecture in Yunnan (Dai and Jingpo autonomous prefecture)
abbr. for 德宏傣族景頗族自治州|德宏傣族景颇族自治州, Dehong Dai and Jingpo autonomous prefecture in west Yunnan surrounded on three sides by Myanmar (Burma)
Dehong Dai and Jingpo autonomous prefecture in west Yunnan, surrounded on three sides by Myanmar (Burma), capital Luxi 潞西市
pinyin: De2 hong2 Dai3 zu2 Jing3 po1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

sentences.english: Create macro libraries to store common macro routines in one place.
sentences.chinese: 在同一个地方建库，存放所有类似的宏文件。

sentences.english: The following example shows the metadata for a macro community content component.
sentences.chinese: 下面的示例演示宏社区内容组件的元数据。

sentences.english: It can be used both in the macro pattern and in the expansion.
sentences.chinese: 它可以用于宏模式和展开式中。

sentences.english: Super-excellent right distinct water ? certificate bluebeard neon gun fragrance cheek ? door family background steward.
sentences.chinese: 水嶋宏扮演的是管家名门出身的超优秀的管家。

sentences.english: The formal parameter list of a macro definition uses the identifier more than once.
sentences.chinese: 宏定义的形参表多次使用该标识符。

sentences.english: Macros exploit this fact by manipulating code as data before evaluating it.
sentences.chinese: 宏利用这种事实，在求值之前将代码作为数据操作。

sentences.english: You can also change the next screen order from the advanced macro editor.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以在高级宏编辑器中更改后续屏幕的顺序。

sentences.english: To run this macro, follow these steps.
sentences.chinese: 为了运行这个宏，遵循以下步骤。

sentences.english: The below macro has many fallbacks to cover what happens if you're not mousing over a target.
sentences.chinese: 当使用下面的宏，你的鼠标没有指向一个目标，。

sentences.english: Now it is time to associate the macro you created previously with this control.
sentences.chinese: 现在是时候将您前面创建的宏和这个控件关联起来了。

sentences.english: All staff of Hongqiang company look forward to sincere cooperation with you and will provide you with the best services.
sentences.chinese: 爱信宏强人愿与您真诚合作，为您提供最满意的服务。

sentences.english: Many programming languages also permit minitranslation programs called macros.
sentences.chinese: 许多编程语言也容许叫做宏的小型翻译程序。

sentences.english: Featuring High Quality Acer Aspire Laptops to your work comfort and performance.
sentences.chinese: 展出高品质宏膝上型电脑你渴望舒适的工作和业绩。

sentences.english: This article presents a macro assembler.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一个宏汇编程序。

sentences.english: When Tuckhorn never shows up to work, Sucre leaves.
sentences.chinese: 塔克斯宏并没有出现在办公室，苏克雷准备离开。

definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
